hire purchase.translation[0].definitions: a way of buying expensive goods by regularly paying small amounts over a period of time
hire purchase.translation[1].definitions: a way of buying expensive goods by making regular payments over a period of time. Under hire purchase, the person buying the goods has a right to use the goods during the time they are paying for them, but does not become the legal owner until the final payment has been made
A lot of new cars are bought on hire purchase.
The hire purchase price is always higher than the cash price.
